thread.title: Fearless Girl Statue Vandalized To Look Like A Trump Supporter!
thread.title_full: Fearless Girl Statue Vandalized To Look Like A Trump Supporter!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Fearless Girl Statue Vandalized To Look Like A Trump Supporter!

organizations.name: trump's budget proposal will defund pbs

text:
Gross.
The "Fearless Girl" statue has been an inspiration to women and their allies ever since it went up facing the famous Wall Street bull earlier this month.
Which of course makes it a target for disgusting misogynists like the banker who shared a pic of himself humping it a week or so ago (see and gag above).
Related: Chelsea Clinton Is Writing An Empowering Children's Book Called She Persisted ! 
But as bad as that jackass was, what some Donald Trump supporters did to her late Sunday night was even worse. They assimilated her.
You can see an example of that ugliness (below)! 
Men In MAGA Hats Transform 'Fearless Girl' Statue Into Trump Supporter https://t.co/on1TgRIu9f pic.twitter.com/rRx15gktRF 
â€” Gothamist (@Gothamist) March 20, 2017 

Yep. They turned her into a Trump supporter.
According to Gothamist , some jerks in Make America Great Again hats ran up to the statue just after midnight and draped her in and American flag and her own gaudy red cap.
Related: Trump's Budget Proposal Will Defund PBS, NPR, & The NEA! 
They even gave her signs like "Vets B4 Illegals" and "Trump" with picture of the white nationalist mascot Pepe The Frog.
Thankfully none of what they did appears to be permanent, but SO infuriating they did this to a Girl who couldn't fight back. Though that is typical Trump, isn't it?
But on the other hand, we like to think she does kind of does fight back. We mean, just look at how defiant she is no matter what!
[ Image via Twitter /Johnny Louis/ WENN . ]
